# General & Architecture Documentation

This directory contains general project documentation, including architecture guides, decision logs, and cross-cutting concerns that apply to both frontend and backend.

## Firebase Token Authentication

Complete implementation guide for Firebase token-based authentication across the application.

- **[FIREBASE_TOKEN_AUTH.md](./FIREBASE_TOKEN_AUTH.md)** - Architecture overview and security design
- **[FIREBASE_TOKEN_IMPLEMENTATION.md](./FIREBASE_TOKEN_IMPLEMENTATION.md)** - Implementation details and configuration
- **[FIREBASE_TOKEN_TESTING.md](./FIREBASE_TOKEN_TESTING.md)** - Step-by-step testing instructions
- **[FIREBASE_TOKEN_QUICKSTART.md](./FIREBASE_TOKEN_QUICKSTART.md)** - Quick reference checklists
- **[FIREBASE_TOKEN_COMPLETE.md](./FIREBASE_TOKEN_COMPLETE.md)** - Project status summary
- **[CODE_CHANGES_REFERENCE.md](./CODE_CHANGES_REFERENCE.md)** - Before/after code comparisons
- **[IMPLEMENTATION_COMPLETE.md](./IMPLEMENTATION_COMPLETE.md)** - Implementation completion report

## Quick Navigation

| Document                         | Purpose                 | Audience                |

- **Frontend-specific docs** → See `./docs/`
- **Backend-specific docs** → See `./server/docs/`
